flawed_nl_solution:
The craft store made 36 / 3 = <<36/3=21.0>>21.0 sales in the fabric section.
It made 36 / 4 = <<36/4=9.0>>9.0 sales in the jewelry section.
Thus, there were 36 - 21.0 - 9.0 = <<36-21.0-9.0=6.0>>6.0 sales in the stationery section.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
